# Residuals histogram

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
ggplot()+
  geom_histogram(aes(explainer_scikit$residuals, fill = "Champion"), alpha = 0.4, binwidth = 0.08)+
  geom_histogram(aes(explainer_mlr$residuals, fill = "Challenger"), alpha = 0.4, binwidth = 0.08)+
  scale_fill_manual(name = "", values = c("Champion" = "red", "Challenger" = "blue"), 
                    labels = c(explainer_mlr$label, explainer_scikit$label))+
  labs(x = "residuals", y = "observations")+
  theme_drwhy()
```
